After surrounding the opponent with flowers, the user will ignite the flowers. These flames will then shoot towards and explode on the target.

== Trivia ==
* The phrase {{Translation|"Hyakkaryōran"|百花繚乱|lit meaning=Riot of Flowers}} is a Japanese idiom that describes situations in which a number of vivid flowers blooming wildly, but is used for human beings as well to describe many skilled, smart, talented and/or beautiful people gathering up in one place at once.

[[es:Arte Ninja Floral: Floración Miriado de Flores]]
[[pl:Hana Ninpō: Hyakkaryōran]]
[[pt-br:Arte Ninja de Flor: Liberação de Muitas Flores]]
